name: Frogcellent
description:
It's a remake from a game I made in 2002, a simple PvP game to play from 2 to 4 players.

The game is locked in 800x600 window mode.

Input:

  • Player 1 (green): ARROWS
  • Player 2 (red): WASD
  • Player 3 (blue): IKJL
  • Player 4 (purple): WASD

Resources:

  • Art and programming by Haharo
  • Music and audio CC-0 found on https://opengameart.org
